queries.query: SELECT arbo.nom AS appName, lienarticlenoeud.*, article.* FROM arbo JOIN lienarticlenoeud ON arbo.id_noeud = lienarticlenoeud.noeud JOIN article ON lienarticlenoeud.article = article.id_article WHERE arbo.parent = 1
